Generate ALT attributes for your pictures

Enter your website and start tagging your images with accessible descriptions!

How to set ALT attributes for images on your website

  1. Enter your website address
  2. Tag your images with descriptions with the editor above
  3. Add the script generated above to the head of your website: it will be the source of the alt tet descriptions for your web page.
  4. Add this script right after the script with image descriptions: 
    
 <script src="https://unpkg.com/axios/dist/axios.min.js"></script>
 <script type='text/javascript' src='https://cdn.blinkloader.com/express/xtck33x4T1ur1pxRGqA4wnxOL/alttexts.min.js'></script>
    It will place all the descriptions as the alt tags on your page and also supply missing image descriptions with Google Vision API. See description of the project and GitHub repository for more information.

    5. Now you have both your and AI-generated alt tags on your website!
